data.message: In the top of the app, why is there a bubble with my picture that says "your story" next to a pic of a guy I rarely talk to? How do I get rid of this?

replies.message: Hi Jorge. You will be able to swipe away from these features when you don't want to create content or flip through Stories that friends have shared and continue browsing your News Feed like you've done before. However, people cannot remove these features from the Facebook app. -Jon

Isn't that an invasion of privacy letting anybody who wants to just come on someone's Facebook page and post any kind of pictures and stories that they want , and we have no say or option about it ? RIDICULOUS !!!!!!!
Why is it there? What does it do? Why is it just pictures of me and one other guy I hardly know every time I open the app???
I came here to try to find how to get rid of that too!!! Also, why can't I swipe right to see my friends online anymore???? Sorry I updated!
FB swiping does Squat..getting really annoyed
Swiping does not get rid of them.
I would like to remove it as well!

I came here to figure out how to hide the direction/stories area too. Yeah swiping doesn't get rid of it. 

Come on FB..make things optional and your so called improvements will go over better
Jon from Facebook is telling pinnocchio stories....they do not swipe away 😂
